Heroes.Description: - Uppercut no longer roots your hero during cast time
- Can now keep firing if he jumps and his laser is already warmed up
- Reverted recent change to make hook have an alternate cast mode to pierce through allies/enemies
- Bullet damage growth per boon increased from +1.46 to +1.8
- Base health reduced from 625 to 600
- Fixed some control issues when flying near a wall
- Objectives and Rejuvenator are now frozen and invulnerable when under frozen shelter
- Self Damage no longer consumes shields (general change)
- Ground Slam now allows you to turn during the descent
- Bullet growth from 1.15 to 0.9
- Medicinal Spectre radius reduced from 6m to 5m
- Medicinal Spectre radius now grows with Spirit Power (0.07)
- Camera zooms out a little bit more when un-burrowing
- Bararge slow reduced from 40% to 30%
- Base bullet resist reduced from 8% to 0%
- Bullet resist no longer scales with Boons
- Headshot reduction increased from 25% to 35%
- Base bullet damage reduced from 14 to 13
- You can now use stamina while flying to get an impulse in the facing direction
- Space bar no longer exists the ability, you have to press the key again
- Improved various issues with the camera
- Puddle punch now telegraphs an effect before it forms
- Base bullet damage reduced from 14 to 13
- Bullet growth reduced from 1.31 to 1.2
- You gain 50% bullet resistance during the 2s ult channel
- Ammo now scales with Spirit Power (0.15)
- Alt fire now fixed to work with conditional damage sources (point blank, pristine emblem, etc)

Items.Description: - Added sound for {{ItemIcon|Tesla Bullets}} Tesla Bullets proc
- Added sound for {{ItemIcon|Toxic Bullets}} Toxic Bullets proc
- {{ItemIcon|Divine Barrier}} Divine Barrier wings no longer fully opaque
- Updated {{ItemIcon|Echo Shard}} Echo Shard sound effects
- Updated {{ItemIcon|Refresher}} Refresher effects colors from green to purple
- Updated effects for the {{ItemIcon|Warp Stone}} Warp Stone bullet resist buff
- Added {{ItemIcon|Lucky Shot}} Lucky Shot proc sound effect
- Revised {{ItemIcon|Silencer}} Silencer cast and duration sounds
- Healing from heroes increased from 35 to 40
- Healing from troopers increased from 10 to 15
- Spirit damage now considers bullet falloff
- Charge distance bonus is moved to innate section
- When passive triggers, you deal bonus +20% Melee Damage
- Now gives a UI indication when reload procs
- Active move speed reduced from 4 to 3
- Active movement speed bonus reduced from 3 to 2
- Bullet Resist reduction reduced from -10% to -9%
- {{ItemIcon|Spirit Lifesteal}} Spirit Lifesteal increased from 8% to 10%
- Bullet Shield shield reduced from 300 to 260
- Spirit Shield shield reduced from 300 to 260
- No longer requires {{ItemIcon|Healing Rite}} Healing Rite
- Lane troopers do not reset the passive regen timer
- Fixed damage reduction on bullets not being reduced by a percentage properly
- Spirit Power scaling reduced from 2 to 1
- Neutral kills now count as a soul capture
- Fire Rate slow increased from 30% to 40%
- Imbued ability now grants +10% Fire Rate when used (same 6s duration as the movespeed buff)
- Now gains +12% Weapon Damage (T1 {{ItemIcon|Extra Charge}} Extra Charge gives +6%)
- Damage reduced from 10% of Max HP to 9%

Abilities.Description: - {{AbilityIcon|Bounce Pad}} Bounce Pad visuals have been replaced with a wind fan (no mechanic changes). The effects also indicate the travel path.
- {{AbilityIcon|Seven}} Seven's {{AbilityIcon|Static Charge}} Static Charge effects improvement to make the boundary more clear
- Minor updates to Abram's {{AbilityIcon|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact to resolve some states faster to reduce visual noise
- Updated {{AbilityIcon|Lady Geist}} Lady Geist Blood Bomb, {{AbilityIcon|Life Drain}} Life Drain, {{AbilityIcon|Malice}} Malice, and {{AbilityIcon|Soul Exchange}} Soul Exchange sounds
- Added {{AbilityIcon|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge wall impact effects
- Added wall impact animation for Abram's {{AbilityIcon|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge
- Improved visibility of heroes caught in the {{AbilityIcon|Singularity}} Singularity
- {{AbilityIcon|Viscous}} Viscous {{AbilityIcon|Splatter}} Splatter effects have been adjusted
- Health increased from +125 to +140
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact getting stuck on ceilings like in the mid boss room
- {{AbilityIcon|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge turn rate reduced a bit
- {{AbilityIcon|Infernal Resilience}} Infernal Resilience reduced from 17% to 16%
- {{AbilityIcon|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge stun time reduced from 1s to 0.85s
- {{AbilityIcon|Hook}} Hook range reduced from 35m to 30m
- {{AbilityIcon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam now does splash damage around a 5m area the beam connects to on the ground (can be used to fish heroes out of cover in some areas)
- {{AbilityIcon|Rejuvenating Aurora}} Rejuvenating Aurora no longer gets canceled when stamina is used
- {{AbilityIcon|Rejuvenating Aurora}} Rejuvenating Aurora T3 reduced from 4% to 3.8%
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse}} Kinetic {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse T1 reduced from 40% slow to 35%
- {{AbilityIcon|Quantum Entanglement}} Quantum Entanglement cooldown increased from 11s to 12s
- Fixed issues with {{AbilityIcon|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot hitting targets behind walls
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl doing damage through buildings
- {{AbilityIcon|Rain of Arrows}} Rain of Arrows Weapon Damage reduced from +7 to +4
- {{AbilityIcon|Rain of Arrows}} Rain of Arrows T2 Weapon Damage reduced from +7 to +5
- {{AbilityIcon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl cooldown increased from 110s to 120s
- Fixed issues with {{AbilityIcon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger hitting targets behind walls
- {{AbilityIcon|Flame Dash}} Flame Dash slow resistance increased from 30% to 50%
- {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop silence and slow debuff duration reduced from 4.5s to 4s
- {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam fire rate slow reduced from 80% to 40%
- {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam movement slow reduced from 80% to 70%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ice Path}} Ice Path and {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam can now also be cancelled by hitting the ability key again
- {{AbilityIcon|Essence Bomb}} Essence Bomb T3 damage increased from 22% to 26%
- {{AbilityIcon|Essence Bomb}} Essence Bomb spirit scaling increased from 1.05 to 1.15
- Fixed a recent bug with {{AbilityIcon|Malice}} Malice that caused multiple blood shards to be absorbed by 1 hero rather than pass through and hit others (it didn't stack that way in any case)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike Damage spirit scaling increased from 0.78 to 0.85
- {{AbilityIcon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike Damage Per Meter Spirit scaling increased from 0.045 to 0.05
- Can no longer wall jump from {{AbilityIcon|Spectral Wall}} Spectral Wall
- {{AbilityIcon|Spectral Wall}} Spectral Wall min range reduced from 7m to 6m
- {{AbilityIcon|Spectral Wall}} Spectral Wall duration reduced from 6s to 5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Heavy {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage}} Heavy {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage spirit scaling increased from 0.3 to 0.35
- {{AbilityIcon|Heavy {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage}} Heavy {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage min range reduced from 7m to 6m
- {{AbilityIcon|Mini Turret}} Mini Turrets bullet travel speed increased
- Can cast {{AbilityIcon|Scorn}} Scorn while using {{AbilityIcon|Combo}} Combo
- {{AbilityIcon|Combo}} Combo T2 reduced from +1s to +0.75s
- Fixed issues with {{AbilityIcon|Paradox}} {{AbilityIcon|Paradoxical Swap}} Paradoxical Swap hitting targets behind walls
- {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage amp per stack reduced from 7% to 6%
- Added a brief lockout period on {{AbilityIcon|Flying Cloak}} Flying Cloak to prevent accidental double clicks
- {{AbilityIcon|Storm Cloud}} Storm Cloud damage reduced from 124 to 110
- {{AbilityIcon|Storm Cloud}} Storm Cloud max radius reduced from 30m to 25m
- {{AbilityIcon|Storm Cloud}} Storm Cloud cooldown reduced from 180s to 140s
- {{AbilityIcon|Storm Cloud}} Storm Cloud audio is now a little clearer when it's cast
- Fixed issues with {{AbilityIcon|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives hitting targets behind walls
- {{AbilityIcon|Slice and Dice}} Slice and Dice damage reduced from 125 to 105
- {{AbilityIcon|Bloodletting}} Bloodletting Deferred Damage Cleared reduced from 50% to 40%
- {{AbilityIcon|Killing Blow}} Killing Blow Bonus Damage from Full Rage reduced from +25% to +20%
- {{AbilityIcon|Killing Blow}} Killing Blow T2 now also increases Rage Amp by +5%
- {{AbilityIcon|Stake}} Stake T1 duration reduced from +0.75s to +0.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Assassinate}} Assassinate bonus gold is now shared with assisters
- {{AbilityIcon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar now reduces bullet armor by 6%
- {{AbilityIcon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar impact damage reduced from 50 to 40
- {{AbilityIcon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar impact damage spirit scaling reduced from 1 to 0.8
- {{AbilityIcon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar spirit power duration scaling reduced from 0.04 to 0.03
- {{AbilityIcon|Assassinate}} Assassinate now does 20% more damage when getting a headshot
- {{AbilityIcon|Assassinate}} Assassinate scope ends when you are stunned
- {{AbilityIcon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch now correctly knocks people in {{AbilityIcon|The Cube}} The Cube up in the air
- {{AbilityIcon|Splatter}} Splatter damage reduced from 110 to 100
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball turn rate improved a bit
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball stun frequency cooldown improved from 1.5s to 1.25s
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch piercing {{AbilityIcon|Unstoppable}} Unstoppable
- {{AbilityIcon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask debuff duration reduced from 7s to 6s
- {{AbilityIcon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask radius reduced from 7m to 6.5m
- {{AbilityIcon|Card Trick}} Card Trick damage reduced from 100 to 80
- {{AbilityIcon|Card Trick}} Card Trick spirit scaling increased from 1.2 to 1.5
- {{AbilityIcon|Card Trick}} Card Trick card projectiles spawn above the reticle rather than on the left side
- {{AbilityIcon|Power Slash}} Power Slash damage reduced from 170 to 160
- {{AbilityIcon|Grapple}} Grapple post cast duration reduced from 0.5 to 0.2
- {{AbilityIcon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation bullet and spirit resistance reduced from 55% to 40%
- Can now interrupt {{AbilityIcon|Power Slash}} Power Slash with parry

General.Description: - Matchmaking is now open 24/7 for all regions
- Added new minimap
Updated base asset and added new unique Hero Icons​
Neutral Camps are now represented by a highlight glow on the buildings they are located within​
The Orange Lane (Orchard) is now the Green Lane (Greenwich)​

- Added a new behavior system. Players can temporarily lose access to certain capabilities in the game. The controls include Matchmaking, Voice Chat, Text Chat, Pausing, and Reporting. The system for tracking is active now, however we will wait on most penalties for a few days as we review the results.

- There is now a low priority queue. The primary way to enter this is through abandoning games, but it can include other behavior. You must complete the required amount of games (escalates based on low priority frequency) to be able to return to using matchmaking normally.
- Regularly misreporting players will result in you losing the reporting function and may in some cases cause you to go into low priority as well.
- New players that are queued solo will only match with other new players until they get 4 wins
- The lane allocation of 1-1-2-2- and 2-2-1-1 will no longer be a possible setup
- A 6 player party will no longer match against solo players. This may result in longer queue times for 6 stacks.
- AFK players will be automatically kicked out after a few minutes
- Abandon Match dialog is now more clear about consequences of leaving
- Abandon Match now has a time delay before you can click it to help protect against some accidental cases
- Added custom hotkeys per hero
- Added little spirit frog legs to the Soul Urn
- Orange zipline is now green
- Space Bar no longer cancels abilities. Abilities can be pressed again to cancel the ones that have a cancel state.
- The Alternate Cast modes "Modifier Button" and "Alternate Cast Button" have had their behaviors merged
- Added UI button hints when using "Alternate Cast Button" in some extra cases
- Added a slider for Double Tap Alternate Cast timing
- Added a slider for Press and Hold Alternate Cast required time
-Changes to Scoreboard (TAB) and Extra Info (ALT)

Previously there was a lot of crossover between the TAB and ALT modes during gameplay. In this update we have separated the behavior of these two modes to better serve different functions. The keys used for each of these modes can be swapped within Keybinds Settings.​
Scoreboard (TAB):​
- Enables cursor mode​
- Displays Scoreboard​
- Displays Damage Summary​
- Allows minimap ping and draw​
Extra Info (ALT):​
- No longer enables cursor mode​
- Quick-upgrade Abilities (ie. ALT+1) each of these can be individually remapped​
- Can now more easily map ALT as an Alternate Cast button​
- Displays extra information on HUD (ie. Zipline Speed Boost Cooldown) - we plan to expand upon this in future updates​
- Client performance improvements
- Game now automatically starts preloading the map once the client is launched, to help reduce load time for most users
- Sand Box orb practice area now displays the time in milliseconds that you hit the orb after spawning

- Added a console command (private_lobby_create) to allow players to create custom lobbies using our servers. This has very temp UI. Once we add a real UI to it along with some misc features, we'll add a non-console way to host custom lobbies.
- Upgrade ability keys are now customizable (Current defaults are ALT+1, ALT+2, etc)
- Adjusted Midboss low health roar sound to be more distinct from spawn sound
- Added Maximum FPS Sliders for Dashboard and In-Game
- Removed Pause limit for hero testing, coop bot matches, and the tutorial
- Added support for launching the game in a secondary monitor properly
- Fixed friends menu scrolling up automatically when it shouldn't
- Fixed being unable to invite offline users to a party
- Fixed invite tooltips on friends menu not being positioned correctly
- Updated medic healing beam colors to be consistent with other heals
- Melee troopers no longer play swipe effect (to reduce some unnecessary noise)
- Added better indication when all four active slots are full
- Updated Ice Dome to fix some performance related issues
- Updated Torment visual effects to reduce some noise
- Reduced intensity of last hit status effect
- Added low ammo indication sound
- Changed open mic audio settings to allow open mic to opt in to team chat or party chat
- Lowered gun arm during Abram's jump animation to not obscure reticle
- Soul Jar return location effects will change color based on the captured state of the Soul Jar
- Distance field shadows and AO no longer visible behind cosmic veils
- Added sliders for FSR and FSR2 sharpness
- Walker AoE Stomp has new effects
- Added Rebirth channel and revive sounds
- Audio bug fixes related to switching spectating targets

Misc Gameplay.Description: - Orbs now favor the claimer rather than the denier when both impact within a very narrow window of each other
- Flex Slot moved from "First Walker" to "Two Walkers"
- All ability and item cooldowns increased by 6% globally
- Max respawn time now happens at 35 minutes rather than 40 minutes
- T4 Items Cost reduced from 6300 to 6200
- Shield regeneration time reduced from 60s to 50s
- Wall Jump activation has been made more lenient
- Wall Jump launch angle can now be steered a bit more
- Jump shooting lockout period reduced from 0.25s to 0.15s
- Souls from bosses now appear much more spread out
- Rope climbing speed increased from 13 to 14
- Taking non-dot damage while on a rope slows you by 30%
- Improved Heavy melee hit registration
- Mid Boss warning now happens at 60% instead of 50%
- Walker beam max range (the sticky portion after being acquired) reduced by 20% (50m to 40m)
- Successful Parry CD reduced from 0.5s to 0.25s
- Fixed Alt Fires not working with conditional bonuses (like Close Range)
- Melee trooper hitbox improved
- Fixed Medic Troopers sometimes using their heal on Guardian boss
- Fixed multiple heroes getting the power-up bonus by standing on top of it before spawns
- Fixed your gun reloading down to a smaller magazine when reloading with higher ammo than your max

Weapon Items.Description: - Hollow Point Round: Conditional Weapon Damage increased from 20% to 22%

Vitality Items.Description: - Majestic Leap: Cooldown reduced from 24s to 22s
- Soul Rebirth: No longer grants 20% Weapon Damage
- Soul Rebirth: Cooldown Reduction reduced from 18% to 15%

Map.Description: Inner Lane Changes:
- Added connections from the Shop to the front of the Department Store and the New York Oracle buildings
- Added veil in the opening at the front looking out toward the opposing side
- Added a cover barrier in front of the opening with the veil
- Moved the catwalk stair in front of the Department Store and New York Oracle closer to the Mid
amber_green_guardian_arena.png
dynamo_01.png
dynamo_02.png
Base Changes:
- Angled the walkway connection from the outer lane exits to the inner lane exits
- Added an overhang below the Patron position
- Added two juke closets facing the Patron
base_update_091224.jpg
Rope Changes:
- Removed the exterior ropes from the Garage and Nightclub
- Replaced interior stairwells with ropes inside the Garage and the Nightclub that give access to the 2nd floor and roof
dynamo_03.png
dynamo_04.png
Rooftop Changes:
- Raised Apothecary and Imports rooftops to match heights of the Record Store and the Comedy Club
- Removed rooftop details from roofs that are not safe
- Added rooftop details to new valid rooftops
Miscellaneous:
- Changed collision on the shelves inside the Armory and Warehouse to improve shooting through them
- Replaced wall landing in front of the Nursery and the Market with an electrical box
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed breakable items outside the underground tunnel
- Removed some duplicate models, lights and geometry
- Fixed bug where the Hotel sign was replacing billboards on other rooftops
- Fixed rooftop details not aligned to the new height of the rooftops
- Fixed enemy team from being able to enter the base side passages
